item.title: @MockBean - Spring Boot's missing ingredient
item.description: I really liked the Spring Bootâ€™s concept, since I first saw it. The only thing, I felt, it was missing was a better support for testing in general. The problem It all started, when I wanted to have a way to test 'current date' logic in my application. It was supposed to be a reusable, easy-to-use feature (via an annotation) in a custom Spring Boot Starter. The starter is based on Java 8, hence JSR-310 Date / Time API is a natural pick.
